籤詩版本二:
Inene akufunekanga libahoye abantu abancinci, xa izinto zingahambi kakuhle uzodala ingxaki.
Isandi sepiyano kufuneka simamele kunye nomhlobo osondeleyo.
詩意:
Le hexagram kufuneka ihlangabezane nomfanekiso womhlobo osondeleyo.
Ukugcina izinto rhoqo kuya kuzisa amathamsanqa.
解曰:
Zhiyinfangxu. Musa ukuhoya ezinye izinto. Ziphathe njengomntu ohloniphekileyo. Bonke bonwabile.
I-Zhiyin Fangxu ineempawu ezine, ezibhalwe ekuqaleni njengeShiyin Fanghua.
籤詩故事一:
◇BoYa undwendwela abahlobo (BoYa Broken Qin)
UBoya, ogama linguYu, onikwe igama elithi Rui kunye negama lembeko uBoya, wayeyinzalelwane yaseYingdu, eChu State ngexesha leNtwasahlobo neXesha loKukwindla kunye neXesha laMazwe alwayo.
UZhong Ziqi wasebenza njengomgawuli wemithi kwiChu Kingdom. Ngenye imini, wadibana noYu Boya edlala uhadi kuMlambo iHan. UZhong Ziqi weva ilizwi lisithi: “Mde njengentaba yaye utyibilika njengamanzi aqukuqelayo.” Aba babini batshata baza bathembisana ukuphinda badibane ebudeni beMid- Mid. Umnyhadala wekwindla kunyaka ozayo.
Kunyaka olandelayo, uYu Boya wagcina idinga njengoko bekucwangcisiwe, kodwa uZhong Ziqi waye wasweleka. Emva kokuba u-Yu Boya efunde ukuba uZhong Ziqi ufile, u-Yu Boya wacinga ukuba akuyi kubakho mculo emhlabeni kwaye akayi kuphinda adlale ihabhu ebomini bakhe.
yithi:
Ukwaphula iYao Qin kunye neFeng Wei Han. UZi Qi akakhathali nokuba udlalela bani.
Impepho yasentwasahlobo izisa bonke abahlobo. Kunzima ukufumana umhlobo wokwenene.
聖意: Lumka xa uphuma emzini wakho nakwesakhohlakali sakho.Xa ufuna ubutyebi lumkele ukuthengiselana.Kuyacetyiswa ukuba ushiywe lixesha.Akuthandeki ukuba abahambi ngeenyawo ababhinqileyo bathuthe amasimi,intshulube zesilika nemfuyo,bekhangela abantu ngenkuthalo. , ukumangalela nokufuduka, ukukhangela impahla elahlekileyo ngokukhawuleza, ukuvalwa zizifo, namangcwaba ezintabeni.
